items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: Two of your choice from {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Nature}, and {@skill Perception}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A {@item shovel|phb}, a set of {@item common clothes|phb}, a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp, and your choice of the following: a {@creature mastiff} with a leash, a {@creature mule} with a {@item pack saddle|phb}, or a set of {@item farmer's tools|stabby}. Optionally, you may have a trinket with you which reminds you of home, family, or a special event or person from your past.

entries.name: Feature: Rustic Hospitality
entries: Since you come from the ranks of the common folk, you fit in among them with ease. You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate among other commoners, unless you have shown yourself to be a danger to them. They will shield you from the law or anyone else searching for you, though they will not risk their lives for you.

items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: Two of your choice from {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, and {@skill Survival}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: {@item Fishing tackle|phb}, a {@item net|phb}, a {@item bucket|phb}, a set of {@item common clothes|phb}, a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp. Optionally, you may have an interesting trinket you found while fishing, or a trophy from an impressive specimen you caught.

items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: Two of your choice from {@skill Athletics}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight} and {@skill Persuasion}

items.name: Tools:
items.entry: A {@item musical instrument|phb} of your choice, {@item smith's tools|phb}, {@item dragonchess set|phb|dragonchess}, or none

items.name: Languages:
items.entry: One common language of your choice, or two if you do not take a tool proficiency

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A tattered tabard or {@item shield} with your coat of arms, a {@creature riding horse} equipped with a {@item riding saddle|phb}, {@item bit and bridle|phb}, and {@item saddlebags|phb}, a set of {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, a set of {@item fine clothes|phb}, a {@item waterskin|phb} full of wine, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 15 gp. Optionally, you may have a trophy won at a tournament, or a memento from a damsel whose favour you won or from someone you saved from bandits or monsters.

items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: Two of your choice from {@skill Athletics}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception} and {@skill Survival}

items.name: Tools:
items.entry: Two of your choice from {@item leatherworker's tools|phb}, {@item woodcarver's tools|phb}, {@item tinker's tools|phb} and {@item herbalism kit|phb}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: 2 {@item hunting trap|phb|hunting traps}, a {@item dagger|phb}, a ranged weapon you're proficient with and one full container of ammunition for it, the tools chosen for proficiency, a trophy from a challenging hunt, a set of {@item traveler's clothes|phb} and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp.

_.displayName: a holy symbol (representing the the inquisition; it also serves as a badge identifying you as an inquisitor)

items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: Two of your choice from {@skill Insight}, {@skill Intimidation}, {@skill Investigation} and {@skill Religion}

items.name: Languages:
items.entry: One language of your choice, or two if you don't take the tool proficiency

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A {@item holy symbol|phb} (representing the the inquisition; it also serves as a badge identifying you as an inquisitor), a {@item prayer book|phb}, a set of {@item manacles|phb}, a {@item chain (10 feet)|phb|10-foot chain}, a set of {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 15 gp. Optionally, you may have a memento from an emotionally-meaningful investigation you carried out, such as a thank-you letter from someone wrongfully accused who was nearly executed but who you cleared of suspicion, or something belonging to someone you mistakenly judged a heretic, only to later find out you had made a mistake.
